languages.text: {n}Волк печально пожимает плечами.{/n} "Не вини нас за то, кто мы есть. Смерть всегда держится близко к воинами Всеотца, и не задумано для нас иных дел, кроме тех, что вершатся в пасти Моркаи".

{n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."
languages.original_text: {n}Волк печально пожимает плечами.{/n} "Не вини нас за то, кто мы есть. Смерть всегда держится близко к воинами Всеотца, и не задумано для нас иных дел, кроме тех, что вершатся в пасти Моркаи".

traits.locale_text: {n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

{n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

{n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地耸了耸肩。{/n}“不要责怪我们，因为我们天性如此。全父的战士时时刻刻与死亡为伍，而我们只能在莫凯的死亡巨口之下，完成我们的使命。”
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地耸了耸肩。{/n}“不要责怪我们，因为我们天性如此。全父的战士时时刻刻与死亡为伍，而我们只能在莫凯的死亡巨口之下，完成我们的使命。”

languages.text: {n}狼は哀しげに肩をすくめる。{/n}「自分を責めるなよ。全知の父の戦士に死はつきものだ。それに、モルカイの口の中で功績を残す以外、何もできない運命なんだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

traits.locale_text: {n}狼は哀しげに肩をすくめる。{/n}「自分を責めるなよ。全知の父の戦士に死はつきものだ。それに、モルカイの口の中で功績を残す以外、何もできない運命なんだよ」

languages.text: {n}El Lobo se encoge tristemente de hombros.{/n} «No nos culpe por ser lo que somos. La muerte siempre ronda a los guerreros del Padre de todas las cosas, y las únicas gestas que nos esperan son las de las fauces de Morkai».
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lobo se encoge tristemente de hombros.{/n} «No nos culpe por ser lo que somos. La muerte siempre ronda a los guerreros del Padre de todas las cosas, y las únicas gestas que nos esperan son las de las fauces de Morkai».

languages.text: {n}Le Loup hausse tristement les épaules.{/n} « Ne nous reprochez pas ce que nous sommes. La mort accompagne toujours les guerriers du Père de Tous, et nous ne sommes destinés qu'aux exploits accomplis entre les mâchoires de Morkaï. »
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Loup hausse tristement les épaules.{/n} « Ne nous reprochez pas ce que nous sommes. La mort accompagne toujours les guerriers du Père de Tous, et nous ne sommes destinés qu'aux exploits accomplis entre les mâchoires de Morkaï. »

languages.text: {n}Der Wolf zuckt traurig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Gebt uns keine Schuld, weil wir sind, was wir sind. Der Tod folgt den Kriegern des Allvaters überallhin, und unser Schicksal führt uns stets zu Taten, die zwischen den Kiefern von Morkai ausgefochten werden."
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wolf zuckt traurig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Gebt uns keine Schuld, weil wir sind, was wir sind. Der Tod folgt den Kriegern des Allvaters überallhin, und unser Schicksal führt uns stets zu Taten, die zwischen den Kiefern von Morkai ausgefochten werden."

languages.text: {n}Kurt, üzgünce omzunu silkiyor.{/n} "Bizi olduğumuz kişi için suçlama. Ölüm, Yücebaba'nın savaşçılarının ensesinden ayrılmaz. Bizim kaderimizde Morkai'ın dişlerinde başarılanlardan başka bir görev yoktur."
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf shrugs sadly.{/n} "Do not blame us for what we are. Death always clings to the warriors of the Allfather, and we are fated for no deeds other than those accomplished in the jaws of Morkai."
